thread.section_title: Capo d'Africa Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Rome first time
thread.title_full: Rome first time - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: chrisch1
title: Rome first time
text: Great find. Good location, not too large, quality surroundings and excellent staff and service. Breakfast spot on and outside on the upper terrace even at this time of the year. Rooms cleaned twice a day and everybody helpful. Having now toured Rome I think this is as good an area as any to stay with lots of places on your doorstep to eat and drink.
